name: .MOBILECONFIG
summary: Learn about .MOBILECONFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: IT administrators can open, edit, and create MOBILECONFIG files in Apple Configurator 2 for macOS.
If you are an iOS device user, and you have received a MOBILECONFIG file that you want to install on your device, you must:
Download the file to your device. After you do, a Profile Downloaded message will appear to confirm your download.
You will see a description of what your MOBILECONFIG file contains. To install the file, select Install.
